casebody.data:
EHMANN, et al.
v.
MEDFLOW, INC., et al. 433A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2018 Mr. Matthew N. Leerberg, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Medflow, Inc., et al. Mr. Harold C. Spears, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Ehmann, Eugene K., et al. Mr. Christopher P. Raab, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Ehmann, Eugene K., et al. Mr. C. Bailey King, Jr., Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Medflow, Inc., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 29th of May 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of May 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 6th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
